response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value and significance for both of us. Given its worth of $8,000 to you, I propose an exclusive offer to acquire it at a special price of $7,500. This opportunity allows you to secure this exceptional item at a competitive rate while ensuring a significant benefit for myself. I believe this proposal presents a favorable outcome for both parties involved. Should you find this offer appealing, please let me know promptly so we may proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 7500}
